thread.title: Trisha Shandor
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Trisha Shandor

author: Trisha Shandor
title: Trisha Shandor
text: We paid over $4000 for furniture and we are stI'll waiting for a dresser and a recliner. Since January 5. I didn't realize that assembly was jot included upon delivery. I spent 3 days sleeping on the floor until I could get someone to come out and assemble my storage bed, which came with missing hardware to assemble it. When I phoned the store, I was told I "must not be doing something right". No, I didn't have all the parts to assemble it. Still waiting for the recliner and dresser with no phone call, no update, nothing. I'd rather just get my money back.
